uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.remote.server.xml

Class XServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.remote.server.xml.XServer

  • public class XServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to a server-side version of the MEKON frames model, and optionally an associated instance store, with all client/server interaction being via XML-based representations of specific actions.

    This class is designed to be used in combination with the companion XML-based client classes, XClientModel and XClientStore. All encoding and decoding of the action requests and responses is handled by this set of client/server classes. Hence the extending and wrapper classes are only required to pass on the relevant documents, and never need to interpret any of the XML contained within.
